pageContext.claim: “Wow, nobody realized how far Mini Mike Bloomberg went in bribing ex-prisoners to go out and vote for Sleepy Joe. He is desperate to get back into the good graces of the people who not only badly beat him, but made him look like a total fool. Now he’s committed a serious crime!”
pageContext.analysis: The Post reports, “Former New York mayor Mike Bloomberg and his team have raised more than $16 million to pay the court fines and fees of nearly 32,000 Black and Hispanic Florida voters with felony convictions, an effort aimed at boosting turnout for Democratic presidential candidate Joe Biden.” Bloomberg’s donations make it possible for people to vote for the candidate of their choice — Biden, Trump or otherwise— in the coming election. That is not the same as paying them to vote or paying for a Biden vote. There's no evidence this is a crime.
